name: crops_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool crops.
Tool description: Plants for agricultural purposes in Spain: info about taxonomy, growing period, fruit type, categorization, and other. Total of 293 species. Being possible to filter by any of the characteristics mentioned above.
API description: This endpoint returns back all crops that are grown in Spain, being possible to filter them through query string (see Optional Parameters).

subcategory.description: Optional. The subcategory of the crop. Default is 'De invierno'.

family.description: Optional. The family of the crop. Default is 'Poaceae'.

commonname.description: Optional. The common name of the crop. Default is 'Trigo'.

speciename.description: Optional. The species name of the crop. Default is 'Triticum'.

consistency.description: Optional. The consistency of the crop. Default is 'herbácea'.

cropcycle.description: Optional. The crop cycle of the crop. Default is 'anual'.

fruittype.description: Optional. The type of fruit of the crop. Default is 'cariopsis'.

category.description: Optional. The subcategory of the crop. Default is 'De invierno'.
